channel.title: Requesting help with Slayer
channel.description:
Hello, I just finished with my Slayer skill and it's giving me a problem that I can't figure out. When the task is about to finish the moment you kill the last monster you have for the task, the server disconnects.
Here's the error I get in my run.bat from when it dc's: [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/a9v39x.png[/img]
Anyone have any idea what the problem could be?
Thanks.
[size=18pt]EDIT:PROBLEM FIXED[/size]

item.title: Requesting help with Slayer
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

Your adding skill XP to a non existent skill. Your skill array apparently doesn’t go to 31. I would assume this is a typo on your part, or you put the XP and the skillID backwards. The skillID is 18 for slayer.

Read full topic

item.title: Requesting help with Slayer
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Probably an uncaught nullpointer.

Read full topic
